articles.title: What Analysts Think Is Changing In The Boston Scientific Growth Story
articles.mainIdea: What Analysts Think Is Changing In The Boston Scientific Growth Story
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What Analysts Think Is Changing In The Boston Scientific Growth Story. Boston Scientific's latest narrative update reflects only a subtle recalibration, with the fair value estimate nudging from about $126.48 to $125.86 per share as revenue growth expectations edge higher and the discount rate shifts marginally lower. These small tweaks highlight an ongoing tug of war between bullish views that see durable double digit expansion and growing skepticism that much of that strength is already embedded in the stock. Read on to see how you can stay on top of these... Related tickers mentioned: BSX.

articles.title: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
articles.mainIdea: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Truist Financial (TFC): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum. Truist Financial (TFC) has quietly been grinding higher, and recent returns suggest investors are warming back up to this regional banking heavyweight as credit fears ease and revenue growth stabilizes. See our latest analysis for Truist Financial. That steady climb has added up, with an 11.5% 1 month share price return, a 17.1% year to date share price return, and a 21.0% 1 year total shareholder return showing momentum is clearly building as investors reassess regional bank risk.
